name: This Ain't Your House!
description:
Where are you? What are you? And why are there so many balloons in this house? All these questions will be answered and more.

After waking up in an unfamiliar house, you struggle to survive the hostile environment that unfolds. Do you have what it takes to live?

Navigate the house, find the key, and unlock that door!

********** This Ain't Your House!**********

Game Objective: Find the key and escape the house

Controls: WASD to move, SPACE to jump

(Created for a 12-hour game jam)

Programming :: Jon Fisher

Art :: Sophia Fisher

Map Design/Sound :: Adrian Fisher
